sql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM title t, movie_companies mc, movie_keyword mk
WHERE t.id = mc.movie_id AND t.id = mk.movie_id AND t.kind_id  =  4 AND t.production_year  =  1988 AND mc.company_type_id  >  1
